slider.parrafo-1: We design and tailor every solution to meet the needs of our clients.
slider.parrafo-2: We provide strategic solutions to our clients, bringing peace of mind to their businesses.

ventajas.parrafo-ventaja-1: We have extensive experience in the automotive terminal industry as well as activities for their suppliers.
ventajas.parrafo-ventaja-2: We design and tailor every solution to meet the needs of our clients.
ventajas.parrafo-ventaja-3: Our policy aims to provide an immediate response to our clients.
ventajas.parrafo-ventaja-4: We provide strategic solutions to our clients, bringing peace of mind to their businesses.
ventajas.parrafo-ventaja-5: We have our own headquarters in Brazil, which facilitates and streamlines administrative and operational processes for our clients in both the region and Europe.

work.trabajo-parrafo: Through constant dedication and relentless effort, we build our professional path, facing challenges and achieving milestones that progressively bring us closer to our career goals.

about.about-parrafo-1: We are a Service Company focused on quality, logistics, engineering, technology, and maintenance areas for various businesses. We design and adapt each solution to our clients' needs.
about.about-parrafo-2: Calycon S.A., led by its partners, was founded in the province of CÃ³rdoba, Argentina, in 2014. We have extensive experience in the automotive terminal industry and activities for their parts suppliers. We handle non-conforming material treatment, recovery, and reconditioning, providing comprehensive logistic support services to meet every need.
about.about-parrafo-3: Additionally, we have our own headquarters in Brazil, allowing us to facilitate and streamline administrative and operational processes for our clients in both the region and Europe.
about.about-parrafo-4: Our policy aims to provide an immediate response to our Customers, offering a strategic solution for their products, bringing peace of mind to each of their Businesses.
about.about-parrafo-5: Our mission as a company will be to build a strong portfolio of satisfied customers with our service over the next 10 years, becoming the best choice for any industrial plant requiring quality control tasks and reworking of auto parts.
about.about-parrafo-6: Our company's vision is to be an organization with a strong presence in industrial plants, recognized within the sector for our quality of service, reliability, and responsibility towards our clients.
